entry.title: $2595 // Beautiful 2 Bed 1 Bath Laundry-Dishwasher in unit! Prime PLG!
entry.content:
Brand New Beautiful 2 Bed 1 Bath Laundry-Dishwasher in unit! Prime Prospect Lefferts Garden

Apartment Features:
- Brand new kitchen with all stainless steel appliances including Dishwasher
- Large living room
- 2 Large bedrooms with closets
- Fully tiled Spacious bathroom
- New hardwood flooring throughout
- Heat & Hot water included
- Laundry in Unit!

On Lincoln Rd and Flatbush Ave, Only 1 Block away to Prospect Park, B, Q, 2 & 5 trains and surrounded by some of the best cafes, restaurants, bars, shops and much more

Contact Benny for more info and exclusive access today! @
646-963-5926
Benny@zjamaRealty.com
